title: Display Connection Issues (HDMI/Monitor)
description: Troubleshooting laptop to TV/monitor connection problems.

steps.title: Check Physical Connections
steps.instruction: Ensure HDMI/DisplayPort cable is firmly connected to both laptop and TV/monitor. Try a different cable if available.

steps.title: Select Correct Input Source
steps.instruction: On your TV/monitor, use the remote or buttons to select the correct input source (HDMI 1, HDMI 2, etc.).

steps.title: Detect Display
steps.instruction: On Windows: Press Win+P and select 'Extend' or 'Duplicate'. On Mac: Go to System Preferences → Displays → Detect Displays.

steps.title: Update Display Drivers
steps.instruction: Right-click on Desktop → Display Settings → Advanced Display Settings → Display Adapter Properties → Update Driver.

steps.title: Try Different Port
steps.instruction: If your laptop has multiple video outputs (HDMI, USB-C, DisplayPort), try a different port.
